Well, since things are really starting to heat up in the election, I thought it would be good if we had a thread where we could debate between the two candidates so we don't clog up a ton of other threads with this stuff.
 
 Let's hear about who you're voting for and why, but please, if you're going to attack a candidate, back it up with some facts, not just a bunch of baseless rantings and ravings.

post_info.post_title: Kerry v Bush: The Great Debate thread
